docs.snippet: Among the first generation of Japanese laborers who immigrated to Brazil more than a century ago, Haruo Ohara photographed a world where man sought harmony with tradition and nature....
docs.lead_paragraph: Among the first generation of Japanese laborers who immigrated to Brazil more than a century ago, Haruo Ohara photographed a world where man sought harmony with tradition and nature.

docs.snippet: Mexico's upper house on Wednesday pushed back discussions on the final touches to the country's landmark energy reform, which seeks to lure new investment into the sector and boost growth in Latin America's second-largest economy....

headline.main: Mexico Senate Pushes Back Talks on Key Energy Reform Legislation
headline.print_headline: Mexico Senate Pushes Back Talks on Key Energy Reform Legislation

docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's upper house on Wednesday pushed back discussions on the final touches to the country's landmark energy reform, which seeks to lure new investment into the sector and boost growth in Latin America's second-largest economy.

docs.snippet: Japan has gained understanding from the Group of Seven industrialized nations on its stance on North Korea, top government spokesman Yoshihide Suga said on Thursday....

docs.snippet: Chile beat Northern Ireland 2-0 on Wednesday night in its final World Cup warm-up game, a match that marked the return of midfielder Arturo Vidal....

headline.main: Chile Beats NIreland 2-0 in World Cup Warm-Up
headline.print_headline: Chile Beats NIreland 2-0 in World Cup Warm-Up

docs.lead_paragraph: Chile beat Northern Ireland 2-0 on Wednesday night in its final World Cup warm-up game, a match that marked the return of midfielder Arturo Vidal.

docs.snippet: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major...

headline.main: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4
headline.print_headline: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4

docs.lead_paragraph: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major leagues this season.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad secures a landslide victory in a wartime election that is condemned as a sham by his opponents. Jillian Kitchener reports.

docs.snippet: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits, lifting the Toronto Blue Jays to an 8-2 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Wednesday night....

headline.main: Surging Blue Jays Beat Slumping Tigers 8-2
headline.print_headline: Surging Blue Jays Beat Slumping Tigers 8-2

docs.lead_paragraph: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits, lifting the Toronto Blue Jays to an 8-2 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Wednesday night.
